Google aims to compete with video-sharing websites like [[DailyMotion]] in France. It also made an agreement with local television stations like [[MÃ©tropole 6|M6]] and [[France TÃ©lÃ©visions]] to legally broadcast video content.
On [[October 17]], [[2007]] it was announced that a Hong Kong version had been launched.
